text: @JBellamyTV And when Covid-19 spreads and thousands die, including the innocent, WTF happens then?  The healthcare system can't handle this.  What if his citizens travel to my state?  @GovKemp does not care if people die.  SHAME ON GOVERNOR KEMP!
